full_output.summary: Ambitious and detail-oriented B.Tech CSE student specializing in IoT and IS. Proficient in AI, ML, and web development. Skilled in creating intelligent systems for efficiency and user-friendly applications. Eager to contribute to organizational success through innovative problem-solving in technology.

projects.name: Autonomous Car Racing
projects.description: Developed the policy/reward function for autonomous driving using the SAC algorithm in the Trackmania 2020 environment with the TMRL library.

projects.name: Smart Crop Tracker
projects.description: Designed a modular sensor package for crop data tracking, integrating ESP8266 with Raspberry Pi for data logging and processing.

projects.name: Password Manager
projects.description: Created a secure password manager with Tkinter UI and SQLite, emphasizing encryption and database security.

projects.name: Algorithmic Trading
projects.description: Developed an automated trading bot implementing the Martingale strategy, achieving breakeven in backtests.

projects.name: Hand Gesture Recognition System for Trackmania
projects.description: Implemented a hand gesture recognition system using OpenCV and Googles Mediapipe to emulate user input for the video game Trackmania, enabling hands-free gameplay using the webcam.

experiences.description: Developed proficiency in Apache Spark, PySpark, and Databricks for efficient data management and analysis. Created custom visualizations for Power BI using Deneb in Vega, enhancing data presentation and insights. Contributed to establishing a flexible pipeline for rapid development of new visuals to meet future requirements.

full_output.name: Aaryansh Sharma
